intro: Ouratea stenobotrys, commonly known as the narrow-leaf ouratea, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves that are usually elliptical in shape. It produces small, white to pinkish flowers arranged in clusters, which are followed by small, round fruits. The plant is often found in moist, shaded environments within tropical forests.
